column3:
@brakmic 
> Tested on macOS Catalina 10.15.3 with Qt 5.14.1

Thank you for your review and testing.

Usually, when a reviewer approves PR, he [starts his message](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#code-review) with `ACK top_commit_hash` ;)
I think this slightly changes the behavior from accepting 'q' to 'q' and 'Q' (shift-q). But I'm fine with this, personally.\n\nedit: oh, also ctrl-Q, as you mention in the PR desc.
